title: sanAthana dharma samvarddhani
sahitya:
sanAtana dharma samvardhani
sunAda priyE jaya bhArata janani

anupallavi

nAnAvida vargha bhEda rahita
gnAna prada sunAda sammOdita

caraNam

mAnava janmamu pAvanamani telpu
gnAnula sandEshamE velupu
mAnasaranjani madilO nI talapu
gAnaswarUpamAy kalgincu mEi marapu
